Tyrael: Dammit! He's under attack!

The computer revealed the weapons being fired. Then, as suddenly as it 
had started, the enemy rocket bot faded from both visual and scanners.

Tyrael: Where is he?

Shadow Star: Either he went away or he cloaked himself. Since we would 
have tracked him down if he had flown away, he must be cloaked.

Tyrael: You must be right. Take Talon and head out to support Spike. 
Crusher, stay with me. If things go wrong, we may have to wake more of 
our fellow soldiers.

Shadow Star: As you command, Major. Talon, follow me!

He gets out of the base, goes to dragon mode and flies away.
